Pre-Game Insights: The India vs. England game is scheduled to start at 1:30 PM IST.
The game is scheduled to take place at Adelaide Oval in Australia.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The T20 World Cup 2022 Semi Final between England and India will be live streamed on Disney+Hotstar.
Others: New Zealand, England, India, and Pakistan have advanced to the T20 World Cup 2022 semi-finals following some thrilling matches in the Super 12.
